title: Provides that candidates who have provided firefighting service may deduct up to a maximum of six years from their age for purposes of meeting the age requirements
summary: Provides that candidates who have provided firefighting service may deduct up to a maximum of six years from their age for purposes of meeting the age requirements.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3154

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. CROUCH, BURLING, FINCH, GIGLIO -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Governmental Employees

       AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to age eligibility of
         candidates for promotion to provisional or permanent  appointments  as
         police officers

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 58 of the civil service law is amended by adding  a
    2  new subdivision 7 to read as follows:
    3    7.  THE MAXIMUM AGE REQUIREMENT ESTABLISHED IN SUBDIVISION ONE OF THIS
    4  SECTION, FOR EXAMINATION OR FOR APPOINTMENT OR PROMOTION TO, SUCH PROVI-
    5  SIONAL OR PERMANENT APPOINTMENT OF CERTAIN POLICE OFFICERS,  THE  PERIOD
    6  OF  SERVICE  AS A VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER AS SUCH IS DEFINED BY THE DUTIES
    7  AND ACTIVITIES DESCRIBED IN SUBDIVISION  ONE  OF  SECTION  FIVE  OF  THE
    8  VOLUNTEER  FIREFIGHTERS' BENEFIT LAW AND THE SAME SUCH DUTIES AND ACTIV-
    9  ITIES PERFORMED FOR A  SPECIALIZED  TEAM  ESTABLISHED  PURSUANT  TO  THE
   10  PROVISIONS  OF  SECTION TWO HUNDRED NINE-BB OF THE GENERAL MUNICIPAL LAW
   11  FOR WHICH THE VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTER DOES NOT RECEIVE ANY REMUNERATION OR
   12  A GRATUITY, IF SUCH SERVICE OTHERWISE FALLS  WITHIN  THE  DEFINITION  OF
   13  SERVICE  AS  A  FIREFIGHTER,  OF  A  CANDIDATE  OR ELIGIBLE SHALL NOT BE
   14  INCLUDED IN COMPUTING THE AGE OF SUCH  CANDIDATE  OR  ELIGIBLE  FOR  THE
   15  PURPOSES  OF  SUCH  EXAMINATION  OR  APPOINTMENT OR PROMOTION; PROVIDED,
   16  HOWEVER, THAT NEITHER SHALL THE TOTAL TIME DEDUCTED HEREUNDER IN COMPUT-
   17  ING THE AGE OF A CANDIDATE OR ELIGIBLE EXCEED SIX YEARS.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04551-01-1
